body_html: We've continued to implement more operators as C++ autograd functions; when I checked last week, we were at ~3.5 seconds for the above benchmark. I think indexing is the operation with the biggest impact that we still have to move. @colesbury is working on that now.
body_text: We've continued to implement more operators as C++ autograd functions; when I checked last week, we were at ~3.5 seconds for the above benchmark.  I think indexing is the operation with the biggest impact that we still have to move.  @colesbury is working on that now.
body: We've continued to implement more operators as C++ autograd functions; when I checked last week, we were at ~3.5 seconds for the above benchmark.  I think indexing is the operation with the biggest impact that we still have to move.  @colesbury is working on that now.
